The 2020 Mazda CX-5 GT is a premium trim level of Mazda's popular compact SUV, known for its blend of upscale features, engaging driving dynamics, and stylish design. The GT trim offers a higher level of luxury and technology compared to the lower trims. Here's a detailed overview of the 2020 Mazda CX-5 GT:
Performance	
Engine: 2.5-liter 4-cylinder engine.
	
Power: Approximately 250 horsepower and 320 lb-ft of torque (when using premium fuel; 227 horsepower and 310 lb-ft of torque with regular fuel).
	
Transmission: 6-speed automatic transmission.
	
Drivetrain: All-wheel drive (AWD) is standard.
	
Fuel Economy: Around 24 mpg city / 30 mpg highway.
Interior	
Seating: Five-passenger capacity.
	
Upholstery: Leather-trimmed seats, with options for higher-quality Nappa leather.
	
Cargo Space: Approximately 30.9 cubic feet behind the rear seats and up to 59.6 cubic feet with the rear seats folded.
Technology	
Infotainment:			
7-inch touchscreen display (an 8-inch screen is available on higher trims or packages).
		
Mazda Connect infotainment system with rotary controller.
		
Apple CarPlay and Android Auto integration.
		
	
Audio: Premium 10-speaker Bose sound system.
	
Bluetooth: Standard.
	
USB Ports: Multiple, including USB-A.
Safety	
Mazda i-Activsense Safety Suite: Standard on the GT trim, includes:			
Blind-spot monitoring with rear cross-traffic alert.
		
Forward collision warning with automatic emergency braking.
		
Lane departure warning with lane-keeping assist.
		
Adaptive cruise control.
		
	
Additional Safety Features:			
Rearview camera with dynamic guidelines.
		
Stability control and traction control.
		
Multiple airbags.
		
Comfort and Convenience	
Climate Control: Dual-zone automatic climate control.
	
Power Windows and Locks: Standard.
	
Keyless Entry: Standard with push-button start.
	
Sunroof: Standard.
	
Driver's Seat: Power-adjustable with lumbar support and memory settings.
	
Steering Wheel: Leather-wrapped with controls for audio, cruise, and other functions.
Additional Features	
Wheels: 19-inch alloy wheels.
	
Exterior: LED headlights, LED daytime running lights, and a premium exterior design.
	
Interior: Heated and ventilated front seats, heated rear seats, and additional premium interior trim elements.

The 2020 Mazda CX-5 GT stands out for its refined interior, advanced technology, and strong performance. It offers a premium experience with a focus on driver engagement and comfort, making it a strong competitor in the compact SUV segment.
As a Steele Auto Certified vehicle, you have peace of mind that the vehicle has undergone a rigorous 85 point inspection and has been brought up to the highest of standards. Don't forget, at Steele Volkswagen we have financing options available for all credit situations! "}]

description: [{'description': "The 2022 Mazda CX-5 GS is a well-rounded compact SUV that strikes an excellent balance between style, comfort, and performance. Positioned as a mid-tier trim in the CX-5 lineup, the GS model offers a range of features that enhance the driving experience without compromising on Mazda's signature design and driving dynamics. Under the hood, the CX-5 GS is powered by a 2.5-liter naturally aspirated inline-4 engine that produces 187 horsepower and 186 lb-ft of torque. This engine is paired with a 6-speed automatic transmission, delivering smooth shifts and responsive acceleration. The i-Activ all-wheel-drive system is standard on the 2022 model, providing enhanced traction and stability in various driving conditions, whether on wet roads or light off-road terrain. The exterior design of the CX-5 GS features Mazda's elegant Kodo design language, with a bold front grille, sleek LED headlights, and a sculpted body that exudes a sense of motion even when standing still. The 17-inch alloy wheels and subtle chrome accents add to the vehicle's refined appearance. Inside, the CX-5 GS offers a comfortable and well-crafted cabin with seating for five passengers. The interior is equipped with premium cloth upholstery, a leather-wrapped steering wheel, and heated front seats. The driver's seat is power-adjustable, making it easy to find the perfect driving position. The 10.25-inch infotainment display is controlled via a rotary dial and offers Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, Bluetooth connectivity, and a 6-speaker audio system. The CX-5 GS also comes with a comprehensive suite of safety features, including blind-spot monitoring, rear cross-traffic alert, advanced smart city brake support, and adaptive cruise control with stop-and-go functionality.
